name.ja: <ruby>絢<rt>けん</rt></ruby><ruby>嵐<rt>らん</rt></ruby><ruby>豪<rt>ごう</rt></ruby><ruby>火<rt>か</rt></ruby>フォニクス
name.zh-CN: 绚岚豪火 凤尼克斯

text.en: If a Quick-Play Spell Card is activated: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If a Quick-Play Spell Card is activated: You can target up to 2 cards your opponent controls; shuffle them into the Deck. If "Mystical Space Typhoon" is activated while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Magnifistorm Great Pyre Phonix" once per turn.
